creator: fsokolovsky@atlas.cz
text:
Bad link ("perldoc perlre") in paragraph:

For more information about regular expressions, have a look at the perl regular 
expression manpage ("perldoc perlre"). If you are interested in more detailed 
information about regular expressions and their variants (POSIX regex etc.) the 
following book is dedicated to this topic

on page:

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.0/mod/mod_rewrite.html#rewriterule

also server http://www.perldoc.com/ doesn't working. Only today (14th november 
2007)?
creator: fsokolovsky@atlas.cz
nd@perlig.de
text: Changed the references to perldoc.perl.org. Thanks for your care.
